DOC.detailed_description: We conduct retrospective , cross-sectional chart review patient underwent anesthetic administer anesthesiologist University California Davis main operating room transfer main ( Pavilion ) post anesthesia care unit January 1 , 2012 March 31 , 2012 . We exclude patient less 18-years age , patient transfer intensive care unit , patient data report . Charts review data collect primary co-investigator ( ) . Analysis consist cross-tabulation count across independent variable , univariate analysis ( outcome variable PACU length stay ) , regression analysis ( outcome variable PACU length stay ) . We aim measure patient length stay post anesthesia care unit ( PACU ) outcome variable .
